info.title: PERSCOM Personnel Management System (Local)
info.description: The PERSCOM API describes how to interact and manipulate your PERSCOM data available at https://perscom.io. The API provides a powerful interface to allow for third-party collaboration and integration with your PERSCOM Dashboard.

value.description: A search for the given value will be performed on the following fields: id, title, content, color, global, enabled, expires_at, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at

case_sensitive.description: (default: true) Set it to false to perform search in case-insensitive way

get.description: The roster endpoint returns a list of groups with their associated units and users already included. The personnel are then sorted by rank, specialty, position and name to assist with creating a roster-like UI.
